pages.text: Constantly refilling $(item)Canteens$() can be a frustrating experience as most survival mods use abstract methods to define canteen fill amounts and fluid types.$(br2)To remedy this situation, the Survival Tools mod implements its $(l:simple_tools/canteen)Canteens$() and $(l:simple_tools/hydration_pack)Hydration Packs$() as actual fluid containers. This means they can interact directly with

modded fluid tanks, bottle filling machines, and in-world fluid blocks.$(br2)Additionally, $(item)Canteens$() and $(item)Hydration Packs$() can be filled at a crafting table by combining them with any combination of bottles, buckets, or modded fluid tanks.$(br2)This does come with one limitation, these containers can $(bold)only$() be filled with $(water)Purified Water$().
